They will appear, but they have nothing to do with your graphics card. When you use the nv driver the whole OpenGL architecture is made out of software called Mesa which is executed by your CPU. The only thing your graphics card does is make a convienient place to plug your monitor into
This is a very slow situation, and doesn;t work for a lot of situations (hence your problem)
